english.segment1: Head over here and take me. Head over heels and aching. When I told you I was yours, I was yours
english.segment2: (chorus). In this life you're the one place I call home. In this life you're the feeling I belong. In this life you're the flower and the thorn. You're everything that's fair in love and war
english.segment3: I'm coming down like a gun shot. In all these battles that I've fought. You're the mark I'm aiming for. I was yours
english.segment5: Head over heels. Head over heels
english.segment6: In this life I'm stubborn to the core. In this life I've been burning after more. We both know what these open arms are for. You're everything that's fair
english.segment7: In this life you're my only one. In this life you're my only one. In this life you're my only one. In this life you're my only one
